short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Phonetically spell everything and paste it to Fb or other places

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Censorship sucks and if you've been censored on Facebook then you have be zucked! Share urls and messages that would otherwise be automatically censored by phonetically spelling out everything. Your friends can then use this tool to convert the phonetic message back to plain text.

Use at your own risk. Scripts by Duke does not condone abusive behavior and it is your responsibility to use this tool in accordance with the terms of use of FB or any other services. Not responsible for the misuse of this tool nor the consequences you may suffer for misuse. No harmful code has been used in the creation of this tool and is intended for recreational purposes. 

This tool uses a very basic phonetic replacement cipher that is easily cracked with a little bit of concentration on the reader's part. Furthermore this tool can be used to de-cipher any text that has been ciphered with this tool. It is neither sophisticated nor secure, your messages will not be secure.
